column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Do you think the religion adds an element of beauty or a fearful element to the culture ?
#Text=Fearful element !
#Text=They have all their God fearing ...
#Text=It really depends on which kind of religion and which kind of place ...
#Text=The kind practiced here , the kind of Christianity found here .
#Text=Yeah !
#Text=The extreme within the religion here in the U.S. , that can be a little terrifying , I think .
#Text=But religion can also add a lot of purpose to people , and when they have purpose they can be more balanced and open-minded .
#Text=I do n't know ... .
#Text=I like the televangelists a lot .
#Text=It 's really entertaining for me to watch a show like that ; it 's really just like Benny Hill and you watch it and ca n't believe it .
#Text=It 's so far away from anything I 've ever known .
#Text=And they talk about Islam being a dangerous religion but you look over here and it 's just the same !
#Text=It 's the same thing .
#Text=They just are n't in madrassahs ...
#Text=No , it 's so crazy ; it 's fascinating .
#Text=On death
#Text=If you could choose your own death , how would you die ?
#Text=Oh , man .
#Text=I would just like to go to sleep one night and not wake up .
#Text=I 'm definitely scared of pain and diseases ; I would n't want to wither .
#Text=I 'll go with Sharin .
#Text=You would n't want to experience it ?
#Text=No way .
#Text=No.
#Text=What is fearful about it ?
#Text=It 's because if you are a creative person it 's the fear you can never be creative again .
#Text=It 's a terrifying feeling .
#Text=I do n't like it all .
#Text=I think about it sometimes , where I think about , " One day you are going to die , you are never going to be here again , you 're never going to do this ... "
#Text=and a whole weird feeling comes down through the body .
#Text=It 's the only experience you can get when you think about death .

#Text=It 's a crazy feeling , but obviously something draws me to it sometimes to experience to really get into my mind frame and think , " I 'm really going to die , I 'm never going to be here , I 'm never going to get up again , I 'm really going to die ! "
#Text=It 's scary .
#Text=Especially at a young age , but if you are creative and have an imagination , it makes it that much scarier .
#Text=But I had a near-death experience when I was in Hawaii .
#Text=I almost drowned , and I came to a point where I accepted my own death .

#Text=So , in a way now , when I think about death , that comforts me a little bit , even though it was such a scary experience at the time , it comforts me a little bit that you can actually accept your own death and actually feel comfortable about it .
#Text=Because I was n't frightened at the time .
#Text=I was basically just comfortable that this it , you know , that this is the end .
#Text=And I was very relaxed , actually .
#Text=So I guess that 's pretty cool .
